message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.ArrayList' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.creatures.CreatureUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.Arrays' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.villagedefense.creatures.CreatureUtils'.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
